title: Kim Kardashian rocks her sweatpants and ditches the makeup for late-night ice cream run
text:
After business comes a little fun, even for Kim Kardashian.

The 38-year-old media mogul and businesswoman was spotted on Friday night in a very casual getup after appointments at the Skims offices in Los Angeles, California, where her body-contouring line of undergarments is managed.

Kim was seen on a McDonald's run in the area, enjoying a $1 cone of vanilla ice cream, in mismatched grey sweat clothes and large grey and black sneakers.

Late night look: Kim Kardashian was spotted on Friday night in a very casual getup after leaving the Skims offices in Los Angeles, in a McDonald's parking lot

Notably, Kim was seen totally makeup free in the snaps, with the shorter, straighter bob version of her hair on display, tied up in a half ponytail.

The mother of four had on a slightly darker grey heather hoodie, and roomy lighter grey sweatpants.

In spite of the enormous size of the baggy pants, Kim's extremely shapely curves were still visible underneath.

She mostly kept her hood on for the outing.

Getting some ice cream: The 38-year-old media mogul and businesswoman was seen enjoying a $1 cone of vanilla ice cream

Casual as can be: She was in over-sized mismatched grey sweat clothes and large grey and black sneakers

She likes the golden arches: Notably, Kim was seen totally makeup free in the snaps

On Saturday, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star posted a cute throwback photo of herself with older sister Kourtney, presumably from their teen years, and she captioned the snap with some telling travel plans.

'We’re going to Armenia' the caption stated simply.

While Kim's mother Kris Jenner is of Dutch, English, Irish, and Scottish ancestry, her late father Robert Kardashian, a famed Los Angeles lawyer who died of cancer in 2003, was a third-generation Armenian-American.

Throwback: On Saturday, Kardashian posted a cute throwback photo of herself with older sister Kourtney

Family moments to cherish: Earlier in the week, Kim posted another throwback photo, in honor of her late father

On September 30, the 16th anniversary of his death, Kim posted another throwback photo, showing her and one of her sisters both kissing Robert.

'Miss you dad.' Kim captioned the emotional post.

'Can’t believe today would be 16 years since you went to heaven. ✨'

Kim wasn't the only one with her father on her mind — her older sister Kourtney, who is the oldest of Robert's four children, also posted a nostalgic snap, showing herself as a little girl being embraced by her dad.

'I miss him so much doesn’t begin to describe it,' she captioned the image.
description: Kim Kardashian was spotted on Friday night in a very casual getup after leaving the Skims offices in Los Angeles, in a McDonald's parking lot. She got a cone of $1 vanilla ice cream.
